title.narrative: FEDOMA Promoting inherent rights and fundamental freedoms of disabled persons in Malawi by enhancing equal access to public life

description.narrative: This project aims to improve the access of people with disabilities to the electoral process and system. It is carried out around the General Elections in Malawi in 2014 and is implemented in Blantyre and Mulanje Malawi. The project will involve comprehens ive inclusion audits voter education campaigning for disabled people as well as strategic advocacy among other activities in order to enhance equal access to participate.Despite favourable national legislation and signed international conventions relating to the rights of people with disabilities disabled people in Malawi still have major difficulties in accessing the justice political and public life systems especially the electoral process. They also have limited knowledge and understanding of legislation and their rights. This project is therefore hoping to improve access and awareness as well as increase the participation of people with disabilities in the elections. The project may also provide strategic litigation cases for future reference.
